question: What is the name of the new chairperson of the National Commission for Minorities?
explanation: Gayarul Hasan was appointes as the chairperson of the National Commission for Minorities (NCM). The Union government has appointed 7 members in the minorities panel the other members are Activist and BJP leader from Kerala George Kurian, former Maharashtra minister Sulekha Kumbhare, Jain representative from Gujarat Sunil Singhi and Vada Dasturji Khurshed, chief priest of Udvada Athornan Anjuman.
